author: Myah Ward
title: Former Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen calls U.S. economic downturn a "devastating hit"
description: Yellen is predicting a big hit for the second quarter.
content:
"We have to open our country again. We dont want to be doing this for months and months and months. Were going to open our country again. This country wasnt meant for this," the president said during Saturday's briefing.
